item.title: 12 Days of Ghidra 2022
item.description: In the spirit of Christmas we ran “Tweleve Days of Ghidra” during December 2022 to help newcommers within the community gain some experience using all the features available in Ghidra. This included: Installing Ghidra Creating Ghidra projects Reversing C/C++ binaries Using Ghidra Structs Writing your own Ghidra Scripts Ghidra Function ID support Download the materials here
